data.name: Clash II Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official Clash II soundtrack made by Adam Skorupa, the creator of music from games such as The Witcher, Ancestors Legacy, Iron Harvest.
data.about_the_game: The official Clash II soundtrack made by Adam Skorupa, the creator of music from games such as The Witcher, Ancestors Legacy, Iron Harvest.
